_sText:
Artysm e-sports Training Map

Creator: Miguel "I-Iybr1d" Silveira


Installation:

1. Extract the .bps, .txt and .res files to your cstrike\maps directory.
2. Extract the "poster" folder to your cstrike\materials directory.


Description: It's my first map for Counter strike and it took me about on 3 to 4 weeks to do it.
It mainly begun as an ideia to a Unreal Tournament Tactical Ops mod map, but i disgarded the project
and only find it a couple months ago.

It's mainly assimetric aim_ map with 4 types of guns and 2 types of granades. Since i really get
bored with mostly aim_ 'cause the normally are just square boxes with more boxes within, i tried
to create a map with a little bit of visual eye candy...

Many thanks to Janus and KillerSkull for their custom textures and brushes and all my friends who 
tested the map and gave me tips for it...

Hopefully i expect to realease more new maps with the next mounts, so keep a eye out ;)


Know Bugs: The streetwalk looks a little to high and some env_cubemap issues (making some textures black from some angles).
